articles.author: Daniel Morris
articles.title: Hogwarts Legacy Outfit Allows Players to Become an Assassin's Creed Character - GameRant
articles.description: A Hogwarts Legacy player shows off their created outfit in the game that makes the player resemble an Assassin's Creed protagonist.
articles.content: A Hogwarts Legacy player has put together an outfit that resembles a character from the Assassin's Creed franchise. The huge focus on character customization in Hogwarts Legacyhas seen a huge influx … [+2883 chars]
